id.description: Unique identifier for the step within this workflow

meta.description: Abitrary metadata that you may use to describe the step.

autoActionTimers.description: Array of timer definitions for repeatedly checking any automatically triggered actions on this step.

actions.description: Array of actions for the step that allow the workflow to transition from this step to one or more others. If none defined, the step is considered to be a terminating step and the workflow completed for any instances arriving here.
